title: 15 Min Guided Meditation For Healing & Recovery | Your Self-Healing Reset
description:
This fifteen minute guided meditation for healing and recovery is perfect to help you overcome sickness, injury, or heartbreak. 
🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

Whether recovering from any difficult situation, like a surgery, or a difficult relationship breakup, taking this time out of your day to cultivate peace, stillness, and self-love is all the first step towards a new and vibrant you. 

This healing meditation is all about raising your energetic frequency in order to create space within the body and mind for positive and powerful energy to be restored. 

Love & Light....

Instructor- Juliana Spicoluk
Location- Rio Perdido, Costa  https://www.rioperdido.com

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.


Your Decisions Today Will Define Your Tomorrow.

tags: meditation for when you are sick
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/7g96Zq9NSqo" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: To the person reading this message.. don't worry.. the pain you're feeling is temporary, close your eyes and remember tomorrow is a new day, a fresh start! Take deep breathes, your gonna be alright! I promise💫 Wishing you a lifetime of happiness, peace, and abundance! Namaste!❤
I have cancer and i practice this during my morning enima so relaxing so glad i found you, you give me strength to face the day ❤️
your videos helped me deal with decades of bottled up depression and anxiety and finally let me move forward with my life.  I cannot thank you enough.
"I am healthy, I am strong, and I am always guided towards healing and balance." And so it is! 💕 Such a blissful meditation practice. Thank you so much 🤍💗💛🌈 what a blessing 😇
I was coughing as I started this meditation and then the healing light stopped the cough and the throat pain. This is a miracle! Thank you for this meditation!
